trans-unit.source: Represents core pieces of custom personalization state information contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary" /> 对象包含的自定义个性化设置状态信息的核心项。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class represents pieces of custom state information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object made available by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示的自定义状态信息中包含片段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>对象可通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>接口。

trans-unit.source: This information is used by other classes and interfaces in the personalization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 通过其他类和接口的个性化基础结构使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the <c>scope</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>scope</c> 参数中的个性化范围关联的个性化数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> that applies to the custom personalization information.
trans-unit.target: 应用于自定义个性化设置信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class using the specified value and scope.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值和范围初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Note that the custom state information contained in the `value` parameter must have an associated scope as specified in the `scope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，自定义状态信息包含在`value`参数必须具有关联的作用域中指定`scope`参数。

trans-unit.source: Entries in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> must explicitly indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> scope.
trans-unit.target: 中的条目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>必须显式指示一种自定义数据是否被视为可个性化中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>作用域。

trans-unit.source: In this constructor, the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property defaults to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此构造函数的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性默认为`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scope" /> is set to a value that is not a valid member of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <paramref name="scope" /> 设置的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 的有效成员。

trans-unit.source: An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the <c>scope</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>scope</c> 参数中的个性化范围关联的个性化数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> that applies to the custom personalization information.
trans-unit.target: 应用于自定义个性化设置信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating if the custom state information is sensitive and should not be exported.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示自定义状态信息是否为敏感信息因而不应导出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> class using the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> that contains data that should not be serialized in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数，可创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>包含不应在导出的 Web 部件格式序列化的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of `isSensitive` to `true`, the Web Parts export handler will not serialize the data for export.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值`isSensitive`到`true`，Web 部件导出处理程序将不进行序列化导出的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Boolean value that indicates if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> contains sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry" /> 是否包含敏感信息的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the sensitive setting for the attribute is set; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该特性设置了敏感设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts personalization information can contain sensitive data that should not be exported to other controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件个性化设置信息可能包含不应将它们导出到其他控件的敏感数据。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the Web Parts import and export process.
trans-unit.target: 此属性由 Web 部件导入和导出过程。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> to `true` causes the Web Parts export handler to not serialize the data in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>到`true`会导致 Web 部件的导出处理不序列化中导出的 Web 部件格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此个性化设置数据项关联的个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
trans-unit.target: 与此个性化设置数据项关联的个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: This property's effect is similar to specifying the scope associated with a public property using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的结果相当于指定公共属性使用与关联的范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set the personalization scope of the personalization information that makes up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性设置组成的个性化设置信息的个性化设置范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>实例。

trans-unit.source: All entries must have a scope associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 所有条目必须都具有与之关联的作用域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scope" /> is set to a value that is not a valid member of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <paramref name="scope" /> 设置的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 的有效成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the personalization state information for this entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项的个性化设置状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An object representing personalization state information.
trans-unit.target: 表示个性化设置状态信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that the custom state information contained in this property must have an associated scope, specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性中包含的自定义状态信息必须具有关联的作用域中, 指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为`null`。
